scripts.dev: npm run stop && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:backend: npm run stop:backend && cd backend && ./gradlew bootRun
scripts.dev:frontend: npm run stop:frontend && cd frontend && npm run dev
scripts.stop: npm run stop:backend && npm run stop:frontend
scripts.stop:backend: taskkill /f /im java.exe 2>nul || echo No Java processes found
scripts.stop:frontend: taskkill /f /im node.exe /fi "WINDOWTITLE eq *next*" 2>nul || taskkill /f /im node.exe /fi "COMMANDLINE eq *next dev*" 2>nul || echo No Next.js processes found
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
